name: orz
description:
This game is a 2D Action Game.
The gameplay revolves around continuously moving to the left.


  • You are at point 0. Therefore, you need to go to point 1.
  • During the journey, if you run out of hearts, you will return to point 0.
  • If you fall off the road, you will return to point 0.

Crawl_Jump

Walk_Run
